author: saumyaphor4252
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42139

- The PR updates the 2022, 2023 and 2024 MC GTs with the RPC geometry fix for the issue in the RPC chambers requested in [this CMS Talk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/fix-for-rpc-geometry-for-run3-data-and-mc/25678) [1]. 

[1] https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/fix-for-rpc-geometry-for-run3-data-and-mc/25678

**GT Differences**:
- See master PR 

#### PR validation:
GTs tested locally with `runTheMatrix.py -l 12034.0,11634.0,7.23,7.24,159.0,159.1,12434.0,160.1,12834.0  -j 8 --ibeos` and `runTheMatrix.py -l 13734.0 --what upgrade`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42139
title: [13_1_X] Update RPC geometry fix in 2022, 2023 and 2024 MC GTs
